ComicInfo.Summary: The legend begins again! This series follows Jamie, a 16-year-old girl who races along the high-tech streets of 2027 Los Angeles, delivering Chinese food on her hover board. When Jamie makes the shocking discovery that she is to play a pivotal role in an ancient war for control of the universe, she encounters a diverse cast of interdimensional shape-shifters, soul crushing assassins, and teenage DJ's. Following the climactic events of the first Deity series and Deity: The Darkness and the Light, Jamie tries to pick up the pieces of her shattered life. Aided by Diamond Diaz, a hot-blooded gun-slinger; Lucius Ego, a dragon prince; and Tommy Lone, a cyber Shaolin monk; Jamie uncovers more shocking secrets about her destiny and the enemy that is obsessed with her destruction--the Ma'Shiva overlord Oris Ogden!
ComicInfo.Writer: Robert Place Napton,Karl Altstaetter,Robert Napton,Karl Altstaetter,Robert Napton
